entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 8:10 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
